EmailTemplate.name: 20JuneWeb-WinningBid.Invite 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder for June 20 Webinar: Building a Winning Bid
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
There's still time to join us on June 20 at 1 p.m. ET, when we will hold a webinar titled "Building a Winning Bid: How to Respond to Requests for Proposals <http://info.mbopartners.com/20JuneWeb_WinningBid_RegistrationPage.html>." Tom Sant, co-founder of management and technology firm Hyde Park Partners, will present a step-by-step process and valuable tips to help you create effective responses to a request for a proposal or quote (RFP/RFQ). You will learn everything you need to compose your RFP, from the cover letter to the format itself. If you are interested in this webinar, but aren't able to attend, don't worry! Register anyway, and we will email you a copy of the recording the week after the webinar. Register today <http://info.mbopartners.com/20JuneWeb_WinningBid_RegistrationPage.html>! ___________________________________ MBO Partners
t: 703-793-6000 e: webinar@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
